Title: Incorrect Permission Assignment for Critical Resource
Description: SiteTree Creation Permission Vulnerability in silverstripe.
AffectedVersions: All versions starting from 3.0.0 up to 3.0.11, all versions starting from 3.1.0 before 3.1.11
NotImpacted: All versions before 3.0.0, all versions after 3.0.11 before 3.1.0, all versions starting from 3.1.11
